title: 5qubit
extract: Building a quantum computer or a quantum communications device in the real world means having to deal with errors. ... In general, a quantum error-correcting code is a subspace of a Hilbert space designed so that any of a set of possible errors can be corrected by an appropriate quantum operation.Oct 26, 2015
